titleStmt.title: Concerning publike-prayer, and the fasts of the Church Six sermons, or tractates. By Io. Br. B.D. Their severall contents are set downe in the next page.
titleStmt.author: Browning, John, d. 1648.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Badger, and are to bee sold in S. Dunstans Church-yard in Fleetstreet at the shop turning up to Cliffords Inne,

notesStmt.note: With a final imprimatur and errata leaf.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
